vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: speak/tell/command
1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
§ 1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 說話
1a) (Qal) 說話
1b) (Niphal) 彼此談論, 說話
1c) (Piel)
1c1) 講論
1c2) 應許 (與其他字合用)
1d) (Pual) 被講論 (詩87:3;歌8:8)
1e) (Hithpael) 講說
1f) (Hiphil) 引領使之逃走, 制服之意 (詩18:47,47:3)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 说话
1a) (Qal) 说话
1b) (Niphal) 彼此谈论, 说话
1c) (Piel)
1c1) 讲论
1c2) 应许 (与其他字合用)
1d) (Pual) 被讲论 (诗87:3;歌8:8)
1e) (Hithpael) 讲说
1f) (Hiphil) 引领使之逃走, 制服之意 (诗18:47,47:3)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: subdue
1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
§ : promise/declare
1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: promise/declare
1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
§ : speak/tell/command
1) to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing
1a) (Qal) to speak
1b) (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
1c) (Piel)
1c1) to speak
1c2) to promise
1d) (Pual) to be spoken
1e) (Hithpael) to speak
1f) (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
